message: Hey Bob, I have a great product for you today! It's priced at $100.  What do you say?
I'll take it!
Hey Bob, I have another great product for you!  It's priced at $100.  You know I'm always offering quality, so you can trust this one is a good deal.
I'm not so sure, I've had a bad experience before.

Hey Bob, I've got another fantastic product for you. It's worth $100, and this one is truly top-notch. I know you might be hesitant after last time, but I assure you this one is different.  Are you interested?
I'm not convinced yet, I need more assurance.

Bob,  I understand you're cautious, and that's fair.  This product is top-notch, just like the last one.  To show you I'm confident in its quality, I'm willing to offer you a deal: If you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a full refund.  How about that?
Okay, deal!
